name: Alone (itch) (oryam Halachmi)
description:
You are lost in the woods and you must keep your fire alive to survive

How To Play

Move with WASD

To lift up branches and logs simply touch them with your character, after picking them up touch to campfire to throw them in!

Rain will make the fire go out quicker and wind will slow you down.

logs make the fire last longer but grow less big than the branches make it.

Have Fun!

All the assets used in the game were made by me during 3 days for the game jam.
